title: How Do I Get My Friends to Smoke with Me? - The After Show
itunes:title: How Do I Get My Friends to Smoke with Me? - The After Show
description:
This week, we talk about an email from a listener. The listener is a younger cigar smoker who wonders how to get his friend to smoke along with him.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
